import React , { useState } from 'react' function InputDetailsHooks () { const [inputItem , setInputItem] = useState({bamt:'', per:'', tip:'', custName:'', totalTip:0, custCount:0 }) const [custArray , setCustArray] = useState([]) const handleAdd = () => {setCustArray( [ ...custArray, {name : inputItem.custName, bal : inputItem.bamt, serPer : inputItem.per, tip : inputItem.bamt * inputItem.per} ] )} const customerTotal = () => {custArray.map((item)=> (totalTip += item.tip)) setInputItem ({totalTip: totalTip, custCount: custArray.length})} return(

Using Hooks

Enter your bill amount

{setInputItem({...inputItem,bamt: event.target.value})}} autoFocus/>

) } export default InputDetailsHooks
